amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress encouraging the construction of a pipeline route from Azerbaijan through Armenia that could reach Turkey and Mediterranean sea ports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment expressing that it is the sense of Congress that the Administration should facilitate the cooperation of the governments in Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Turkey, as well as private companies with an interest in developing Azerbaijan's Caspian Sea petroleum reserves, to encourage the construction of a pipeline route through Armenia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
